about.title: Our Legacy at Roopam Jewellers
about.intro: For over two decades, Roopam Jewellers has been your trusted destination for authentic gold and silver ornaments in Kadiri, Andhra Pradesh.
story: Established with a vision to serve the people of Kadiri and surrounding areas, Roopam Jewellers has built a reputation for trust, quality, and exceptional service. What started as a small family business has grown into one of the most respected names in the precious metals industry in the region.

We specialize exclusively in gold and silver ornaments, ensuring our expertise remains focused on what we do best. From traditional South Indian designs that honor our rich cultural heritage to contemporary pieces that reflect modern aesthetics, every item in our collection represents quality and authenticity.

Our commitment extends beyond just selling jewellery. We offer comprehensive services including buying, selling, exchanging, and maintaining your precious gold and silver investments, always at fair market rates with complete transparency.

faq.question: Do you provide purity certificates for gold and silver?
faq.answer: Yes, all our gold and silver products come with proper hallmarking and purity certificates. We ensure 100% authenticity and provide BIS hallmarking certificates where applicable.

faq.question: What are your current gold and silver rates?
faq.answer: Our rates are updated daily based on current market prices. Please visit our store or call us for today's rates. We offer competitive pricing with transparent calculations.

faq.question: Do you offer exchange services for old jewellery?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer exchange services for old gold and silver ornaments. You can exchange your old pieces for new designs by paying only the weight difference and applicable making charges.

faq.question: What is your return and exchange policy?
faq.answer: We offer a 7-day return policy for new purchases with original receipt and tags. Exchange is available within 30 days with minimal charges for weight and design differences.
